param.name: show.changes.and.comments
param.desc: Show Oxygen track changes and comments

param.name: show.changebars
param.desc: Show change bars based on Oxygen tracked changes. Requires show.changes.and.comments to be set.

param.name: show.changes.and.comments.as.changebars.only
param.desc: Show only change bars for Oxygen tracked changes, the inserts are styled normally, the deletion are hidden. Requires show.changes.and.comments to be set.

param.name: ct.insert.color
param.desc: Insertion color for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as a plain color (i.e. red, yellow, blue), or with a hexadecimal equivalent (i.e. #FFFFFF). The default value is 'blue'.

param.name: ct.delete.color
param.desc: Deletion color for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as a plain color (i.e. red, yellow, blue), or with a hexadecimal equivalent (i.e. #FFFFFF). The default value is 'red'.

param.name: ct.comment.bg.color
param.desc: Comment background color for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as a plain color (i.e. red, yellow, blue), or with a hexadecimal equivalent (i.e. #FFFFFF). The default value is 'yellow'.
